item.title: Navigating the AI Governance Landscape: The Players and the Missing Pieces
item.description: Over the past 5-6 months, I‚Äôve been diving deep into the world of AI alignment and governance. Given my background as a go-to-market practitioner and my interest in advocacy, I‚Äôm particularly fascinated by how this field is becoming more accessible, especially within the private sector. This article is my wrap-up of the research I‚Äôve done so far, along with some thoughts on where the gaps lie in the current AI governance landscape.

item.title: Welcome!
item.description: Thanks for visiting and sorry my blog in English looks pretty empty here. This blog is still in progress. I’m in the middle of migrating from my old site, editing and transferring my content here. Please stay tune!
Connect with me at: LinkedIn Contact: osmithip[at]alumni.cmu.edu

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hello there! üëã Glad to see you’re interested in hearing more about me! This page is kinda long as I’ve tried to reflect on who I am and who I want to be. Who am I? When I write online, I go by the pen name Orn Smith. I’m a writer, educator, and entrepreneur driven to make a positive impact. I’ve dedicated my career to empowering individuals and shaping industries.

item.title: Marketing & Training
item.description: I’m passionate in educational design, capacity building and helping individuals and organizations grow. My specialization is in Inbound Marketing and related fields. Inbound Marketing (Digital Marketing Strategy) Inbound Marketing is a set of proven marketing strategies that brings together branding, content marketing, first-party data collection, and marketing technology. It‚Äôs been a secret sauce of how I acquired and retain customers of my businesses, as well as providing the service to my clients.

item.title: Venture Building
item.description: As a seasoned entrepreneur, I’ve played a pivotal role in the founding and growth of several successful ventures across diverse industries. My portfolio includes experiences in media & publication, education, digital marketing services, and e-commerce products. One of my most notable accomplishments is the development of “Content Shifu,” a leading digital marketing media, education, and ecosystem builder. From its inception, I spearheaded its growth into a thriving company that has established a strong presence in the market.

item.title: Welcome to My Portfolio
item.description: A passionate professional with experience at the intersection of entrepreneurship, marketing, education and social innovation. I recently completed a Master degree in Public Policy & Management at Carnegie Mellon University. Prior to that, I have 10 years of experience in the online content and marketing industries, as well as 7+ years as an entrepreneur, consultant and educator and have educated over 3,000 professionals. Skills and Experience Product discovery and venture building read more about them Strategic Marketing and Consulting Event & media relations Education & Community Empowerment Responsible Technology & Policy This page is still a work in progress Want to explore more or see more details?
